allow: Bash(powershell -Command "$env:PGPASSWORD=''1234''; & ''C:\Program Files\PostgreSQL\17\bin\psql.exe'' -h localhost -U postgres -d rockOpsDB -c ''SELECT version, description, type, installed_on, success FROM flyway_schema_history ORDER BY installed_rank DESC LIMIT 5;''")
